PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>

INSERT	{ ?dist dcterms:format ?fmt }
WHERE
	{ ?dist dcterms:description ?desc .
	FILTER NOT EXISTS { ?dist dcterms:format ?o } 
	FILTER (STRSTARTS(?desc, "WMS") || STRSTARTS(?desc, "WCS") || STRSTARTS(?desc, "WFS")) 
	BIND (SUBSTR(?desc, 1, 3) AS ?fmt) }
